snippet.title: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot - Official Reveal Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Here's your look at Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot, an upcoming game set in the Despot's universe (Despotism 3K, Despot's Game). In Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot, you take on the role of a sentient blob on a path of revenge towards humans and his creator. Watch as the slime takes on hordes of enemies in a sci-fi world.
